text: Rectory Road railway station is a railway station in Stoke Newington in the London Borough of Hackney, North London, United Kingdom. It is on the Seven Sisters branch of the Lea Valley Lines, between Stoke Newington and Hackney Downs. It is in Zone 2 and has two platforms. Trains run south to Liverpool Street and north to Enfield Town and Cheshunt. ==Gallery== image:Rectory Road stn look north.JPG|Looking north image:Rectory Road stn look south.JPG|Looking south image:Rectory Road stn entrance look west.JPG|Entrance looking west image:Rectory Road stn signage.JPG|Platform signage == References == ==Other websites== Category:Railway stations in the London Borough of Hackney Category:London Travelcard zone 2 Category:Railway stations served by National Express East Anglia
title: Rectory Road railway station
